Instance.description: The follow-up situation for Breaking and Entering. This situation represents the resident sims of the active lot returning to their home to likely find the player sim in the midst of snooping.

Tunable.name: _zone_director
Tunable.description: This zone director will automatically be requested by the situation during zone spin up.

TunableTuple.name: resident_sims_job_and_role_state
TunableTuple.display: Resident Sims Job And Role State
TunableTuple.description: The job and role state of the resident Sims who live on the lot.

Tunable.name: role_state
Tunable.description: A role state the sim assigned to the job will perform

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that can be performed at this Situation.
